result.markdown:
# Home visit: Visualizations

## Setup




::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidyverse)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
── Attaching core tidyverse packages ──────────────────────── tidyverse 2.0.0 ──
✔ dplyr     1.1.4     ✔ readr     2.1.5
✔ forcats   1.0.0     ✔ stringr   1.5.1
✔ ggplot2   3.5.1     ✔ tibble    3.2.1
✔ lubridate 1.9.3     ✔ tidyr     1.3.1
✔ purrr     1.0.2     
── Conflicts ────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse_conflicts() ──
✖ dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter()
✖ dplyr::lag()    masks stats::lag()
ℹ Use the conflicted package (<http://conflicted.r-lib.org/>) to force all conflicts to become errors
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
source("../R/mcdi_viz_wordcloud.R")
```
:::




## Demographics {-}




::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
if (!('home_visit_df' %in% ls())) {
  targets::tar_load(home_visit_df, store="../_targets")
}
```
:::




### Child age {-}

Child age in months (`age_group`) by `child_sex`.

Note: The child's exact age in months is part of the Databrary-related data. 
That is on the work plan.




::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
home_visit_filtered <- home_visit_df |>
  dplyr::filter(!is.na(age_group),
                !is.na(child_sex))
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
xtabs(formula = ~ age_group + child_sex, 
      data = home_visit_filtered)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
         child_sex
age_group female male
     12mo    146  123
     18mo    129  149
     24mo    109  115
```


:::
:::




A total of $n=$ 771 mother-infant dyads have been tested.
This includes training and pilot visits.




::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
home_visit_filtered |>
  ggplot() +
  aes(age_group, fill = child_sex) +
  geom_bar() +
  theme(legend.position = "bottom") +
  theme(legend.title = element_blank())
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![Participants by age group and sex](home-visit-viz_files/figure-html/fig-age-grp-by-sex-1.png){#fig-age-grp-by-sex width=672}
:::
:::




### Time series {-}

To calculate cumulative visits, we have to add an index variable




::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
df <- home_visit_filtered |>
  dplyr::select(test_date, site_id) |>
  dplyr::mutate(test_date = as.Date(test_date)) |>
  dplyr::arrange(test_date) |>
  dplyr::mutate(n_visits = seq_along(test_date))
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
df |>
  dplyr::filter(!is.na(test_date),
                !is.na(n_visits),
                !is.na(site_id)) |>
  ggplot() +
  aes(test_date, n_visits) +
  geom_point()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![Cumulative home visits by year](home-visit-viz_files/figure-html/fig-home-visit-time-series-1.png){#fig-home-visit-time-series width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
if (!('home_visit_df' %in% ls())) {
  targets::tar_load(home_visit_df, store="../_targets")
}

library(wordcloud)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
Loading required package: RColorBrewer
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
library(RColorBrewer)
```
:::




## Language exposure {-}




::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
df <- home_visit_df |>
  dplyr::mutate(language_child = stringr::str_replace_all(language_child, " ", "_"))
xtabs(formula = ~ child_sex + language_child, data = df)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
         language_child
child_sex english english_spanish
   female     309              75
   male       298              89
```


:::
:::




## MB-CDI {-}

### 12-mo-old English speakers {-}




::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
eng_12 <-
  readr::read_csv(
    "../data/csv/home_visit/agg/mcdi_english_12_combined.csv",
    col_types = readr::cols(.default = 'c'),
    show_col_types = FALSE
  )
```
:::




There are $n=$ 186 participant records.




::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
eng_12_long <- eng_12 |>
  tidyr::pivot_longer(cols = !(play_id | site_id | subject_number),
                        names_to = "word",
                        values_to = "understands_or_says")

#xtabs(~ word + understands_or_says, eng_12_long)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
word_ct <- eng_12_long |>
  dplyr::filter(!is.na(understands_or_says)) |>
  dplyr::filter(understands_or_says == "understands") |>
  dplyr::count(word, sort = TRUE)

quant_25 <- round(n_12_eng*.25, 0)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
# rcb_color_paired <- RColorBrewer::brewer.pal(12, 'Paired')
# wordcloud::wordcloud(words = word_ct$word, freq = word_ct$n, min.freq = quant_25, colors = rcb_color_paired)

mcdi_viz_wordcloud(word_ct, n_participants = dim(eng_12)[1], quantile = .40)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](home-visit-viz_files/figure-html/12-eng-wordcloud-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::




### 18-mo-old English speakers {-}




::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
eng_18 <-
  readr::read_csv(
    "../data/csv/home_visit/agg/mcdi_english_18_combined.csv",
    col_types = readr::cols(.default = 'c'),
    show_col_types = FALSE
  )
```
:::




There are $n=$ 170 participant records.




::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
word_ct <- eng_18 |>
  tidyr::pivot_longer(cols = !(play_id | site_id | subject_number),
                        names_to = "word",
                        values_to = "says") |>
  dplyr::filter(!is.na(says)) |>
  dplyr::filter(says == TRUE) |>
  dplyr::count(word, sort = TRUE)

quant_25 <- round(n_18_eng*.25, 0)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
#wordcloud::wordcloud(words = word_ct$word, freq = word_ct$n, min.freq = quant_25, colors = rcb_color_paired)
mcdi_viz_wordcloud(word_ct, n_participants = dim(eng_18)[1], quantile = .50)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
Warning in wordcloud::wordcloud(words = wd_ct$word, freq = wd_ct$n, min.freq =
my_thresh, : quackquack could not be fit on page. It will not be plotted.
```


:::

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](home-visit-viz_files/figure-html/18-eng-wordcloud-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::




### 24-mo-old English speakers {-}




::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
eng_24 <-
  readr::read_csv(
    "../data/csv/home_visit/agg/mcdi_english_24_combined.csv",
    col_types = readr::cols(.default = 'c'),
    show_col_types = FALSE
  )
```
:::




There are $n=$ 144 participant records.




::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
word_ct <- eng_24 |>
  tidyr::pivot_longer(cols = !(play_id | site_id | subject_number),
                        names_to = "word",
                        values_to = "says") |>
  dplyr::filter(!is.na(says)) |>
  dplyr::filter(says == TRUE) |>
  dplyr::count(word, sort = TRUE)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
mcdi_viz_wordcloud(word_ct, n_participants = dim(eng_24)[1], quantile = .60)
```

## Locomotion

### Select & Summarize {-}




::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
play_loco <- home_visit_df |>
  dplyr::select(
    age_group,
    child_sex,
    language_child,
    site_id,
    subject_number,
    locomotor_milestones.who_walk.who_walk_onset_mo,
    locomotor_milestones.k_walk.k_walk_onset_mo,
    locomotor_milestones.crawl_onset.crawl_onset_mo
  ) |>
  dplyr::rename(
    walk_mos_who = locomotor_milestones.who_walk.who_walk_onset_mo,
    walk_mos_kea = locomotor_milestones.k_walk.k_walk_onset_mo,
    crawl_mos = locomotor_milestones.crawl_onset.crawl_onset_mo
  ) |>
  dplyr::mutate(
    walk_mos_who = as.numeric(walk_mos_who),
    walk_mos_kea = as.numeric(walk_mos_kea),
    crawl_mos = as.numeric(crawl_mos)
  )
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
xtabs(formula = ~ child_sex + age_group, data = play_loco)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
         age_group
child_sex 12mo 18mo 24mo
   female  146  129  109
   male    123  149  115
```


:::
:::




### Check for anomalous values {-}




::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
crawl_mos_min <- 4
walk_mos_min <- 6
```
:::




#### Anomalous crawling onset {-}




::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
play_loco |>
  dplyr::select(site_id, subject_number, crawl_mos) |>
  dplyr::filter(crawl_mos < crawl_mos_min) |>
  knitr::kable(format = 'html') 
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
`````{=html}
<table>
 <thead>
  <tr>
   <th style="text-align:left;"> site_id </th>
   <th style="text-align:left;"> subject_number </th>
   <th style="text-align:right;"> crawl_mos </th>
  </tr>
 </thead>
<tbody>
  <tr>
   <td style="text-align:left;"> CHOPH </td>
   <td style="text-align:left;"> 003 </td>
   <td style="text-align:right;"> 3.72 </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
   <td style="text-align:left;"> PRINU </td>
   <td style="text-align:left;"> 020 </td>
   <td style="text-align:right;"> -5.69 </td>
  </tr>
</tbody>
</table>

`````
:::
:::




#### Anomalous walking onset (KEA criteria) {-}




::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
play_loco |>
  dplyr::select(site_id, subject_number, walk_mos_kea) |>
  dplyr::filter(walk_mos_kea < walk_mos_min) |>
  knitr::kable(format = 'html') 
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
`````{=html}
<table>
 <thead>
  <tr>
   <th style="text-align:left;"> site_id </th>
   <th style="text-align:left;"> subject_number </th>
   <th style="text-align:right;"> walk_mos_kea </th>
  </tr>
 </thead>
<tbody>
  <tr>
   <td style="text-align:left;"> CSUFL </td>
   <td style="text-align:left;"> 011 </td>
   <td style="text-align:right;"> 0.76 </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
   <td style="text-align:left;"> UMIAM </td>
   <td style="text-align:left;"> 018 </td>
   <td style="text-align:right;"> 2.76 </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
   <td style="text-align:left;"> PRINU </td>
   <td style="text-align:left;"> 020 </td>
   <td style="text-align:right;"> -2.93 </td>
  </tr>
</tbody>
</table>

`````
:::
:::




#### Anomalous walking onset (WHO criteria) {-}




::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
play_loco |>
  dplyr::select(site_id, subject_number, walk_mos_who) |>
  dplyr::filter(walk_mos_who < walk_mos_min) |>
  knitr::kable(format = 'html') 
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
`````{=html}
<table>
 <thead>
  <tr>
   <th style="text-align:left;"> site_id </th>
   <th style="text-align:left;"> subject_number </th>
   <th style="text-align:right;"> walk_mos_who </th>
  </tr>
 </thead>
<tbody>
  <tr>
   <td style="text-align:left;"> PRINU </td>
   <td style="text-align:left;"> 020 </td>
   <td style="text-align:right;"> -3.29 </td>
  </tr>
</tbody>
</table>

`````
:::
:::




### Crawl onset {-}




::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
play_loco |>
  dplyr::filter(crawl_mos > crawl_mos_min, !is.na(crawl_mos)) |>
  ggplot() +
  aes(crawl_mos, fill = child_sex) +
  geom_histogram(bins = 12) +
  theme(legend.position = "bottom") +
  theme(legend.title = element_blank())
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![Age of crawling onset (mos) by sex](home-visit-viz_files/figure-html/fig-crawl-onset-hist-1.png){#fig-crawl-onset-hist width=672}
:::
:::




### Walk onset {-}




::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
play_loco |>
  dplyr::filter(walk_mos_kea > walk_mos_min, !is.na(walk_mos_kea)) |>
  ggplot() +
  aes(walk_mos_kea, fill = child_sex) +
  theme(legend.position="bottom") +
  geom_histogram(bins = 10)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![Age (mos) of walking onset (KEA criteria) by sex](home-visit-viz_files/figure-html/fig-walk-mos-kea-1.png){#fig-walk-mos-kea width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
play_loco |>
  dplyr::filter(walk_mos_who > walk_mos_min, !is.na(walk_mos_who)) |>
  ggplot() +
  aes(walk_mos_who, fill = child_sex) +
  geom_histogram(bins=12) +
  theme(legend.position="bottom") +
  theme(legend.title = element_blank())
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![Age (mos) of walking onset (WHO criteria) by sex](home-visit-viz_files/figure-html/fig-walk-mos-who-1.png){#fig-walk-mos-who width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
play_loco |>
  dplyr::filter(walk_mos_who > walk_mos_min, !is.na(walk_mos_who), 
                walk_mos_kea > walk_mos_min, !is.na(walk_mos_kea)) |>
  ggplot() +
  aes(walk_mos_who, walk_mos_kea, color = child_sex) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm") +
  xlim(8, 18) +
  ylim(8, 18) +
  theme(legend.position = "bottom") +
  theme(aspect.ratio = 1) +
  theme(legend.title = element_blank()) -> walk_p

ggExtra::ggMarginal(
  walk_p,
  play_loco,
  walk_mos_who,
  walk_mos_kea,
  type = "density",
  margins = "both",
  groupColour = TRUE,
  groupFill = TRUE
)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
`geom_smooth()` using formula = 'y ~ x'
```


:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
(`stat_smooth()`).
```



:::

```

(`geom_point()`).
```

```
(`geom_smooth()`).
```
